body:
Comment 20 by **awalterschulze**: 
Thanks a lot Brad for fixing the bug :)
Thank you Russ for making me believe in very intelligent argument generating bots.
I guess I must have missed a few advances in artificial intelligence.

The fix seems like a lot of stuff I already did with some extra stuff, oh well.

I'll stick to reporting bugs from now on.
Trying to contribute is way to painful.

It seems you are trying to build a core group of contributors, who are going to
contribute a lot, while trying to build a community of bug reporters and external
package programmers.  Makes a lot of sense. I probably would have done the same.
